error.description: The error message if the request was unsuccessful

error_code.description: The error code if the request was unsuccessful

organization_id.description: The ID of the organization the user has roles in

roles.description: The roles the user has in the organization, e.g. can_view, can_edit

items.description: The roles the user has in the organization, e.g. can_view, can_edit

success.description: Whether or not the request was successful or not
